channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report E-2024020080
item.description:
Report E-2024020080

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-12T18:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-06
  • City: SOUTHINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While unloading freight from trailer material handler discovered a box that was slightly leaking. Further investigation revealed that a box had been slightly punctured by a forkblade during loading thus consequently puncturing an inner container contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the punctured inner container.
